description:
**Fix Overview**:

To resolve the elevation of privilege vulnerability associated with the Windows USB Video Class System Driver (CVE-2024-43634), apply the relevant KB updates based on your system's build:

1. For Windows 11 Version 24H2 for x64-based Systems, apply KB5046617.
2. For Windows 11 Version 23H2 for x64-based Systems, apply KB5046633.
3. For Windows 10 x64-based Systems, apply KB5046665.
4. For Windows 10 and Windows 11 32-bit Systems (22H2 and 21H2), apply KB5046613.

**Details**:
- These updates address an out-of-bounds read vulnerability that could allow an attacker to elevate privileges on the affected system.
- Ensure your system matches the build numbers indicated above before applying any updates.
- For direct installation, access the update packages at the links provided: 
  - [KB5046617](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5046617)
  - [KB5046633](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5046633)
  - [KB5046665](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5046665)
  - [KB5046613](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5046613).

**Preconditions**:
- Verify system compatibility with the provided build numbers.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with updates.
